Article Text:

(Posthumous) Kailash Chandra Pant Kalamandalam Vimala Menon Kewal Krishan Thakral Khem Raj Sundriyal Kollakal Devaki Amma G Krishnamurty Balasubramanian Kumar Bose Kumarasamy Thangaraj (Dr.) Lars-Christian Koch Liudmila Viktorovna Khokhlova Madhavan Ranganathan Maganti Murali Mohan Mahendra Kumar Mishra Mahendra Nath Roy Mamidala Jagadesh Kumar Ms. Mangala Kapoor Mir Hajibhai Kasambhai Mohan Nagar Narayan Vyas Naresh Chandra Dev Varma Nilesh Vinodchandra Mandlewala Nuruddin Ahmed Othuvaar Thiruthani Swaminathan Dr. Padma Gurmet Palkonda Vijay Anand Reddy Ms. Pokhila Lekthepi Dr. Prabhakar Basavprabhu Kore Prateek Sharma Praveen Kumar Prem Lal Gautam Prosenjit Chatterjee Dr. Punniamurthy Natesan R Krishnan (Posthumous) R V S Mani Rabilal Tudu Raghupat Singh (Posthumous) Raghuveer Tukaram Khedkar Rajastapathi Kaliappa Goundar Rajendra Prasad Rama Reddy Mamidi (Posthumous) Ramamurthy Sreedher Ramchandra Godbole & Ms. Suneeta Godbole (Duo) Ratilal Borisagar Rohit Sharma Ms. S G Susheelamma Sangyusang S Pongener Sant Niranjan Dass Sarat Kumar Patra Saroj Mandal Satish Shah (Posthumous) Satyanarayan Nuwal Ms. Savita Punia Prof. Shafi Shauq Shashi Shekhar Vempati Shrirang Devaba Lad Ms. Shubha Venkatesha Iyengar Shyam Sundar Simanchal Patro Ms. Sivasankari Dr. Suresh Hanagavadi Swami Brahmdev Ji Maharaj T T Jagannathan (Posthumous) Taga Ram Bheel Tarun Bhattacharya Techi Gubin Thiruvaarur Bakthavathsalam Ms. Tripti Mukherjee Veezhinathan Kamakoti Vempaty Kutumba Sastry Vladimer Mestvirishvili (Posthumous) Yumnam Jatra Singh (Posthumous)

NEW DELHI: The Centre on Sunday announced to award veteran actor Dharmendra and former chief minister of Jharkhand Shibu Soren with Padma Vibhushan and Padma Bhushan posthumously.While the legendry film star Dharmendra died on November 24, Jharkhand Mukti Morcha founder Soren died on August 4 last year."Heartiest congratulations to the recipients of the Padma Awards announced today. They are the torchbearers of social change who, with their exceptional accomplishments, game-changing innovations, and tireless commitment, have driven national progress in different fields," home minister Amit Shah wrote in a social media post on X."These awards bear the signature of PM Shri Narendra Modi's vision to turn People's Padma into a medium to strengthen the spirit of nation building by inspiring millions to follow the path of making social change for the better," he added.Of the total awardees, 19 are women. The list also includes six awardees from the category of foreigners, NRIs, PIOs and OCIs, underscoring India‚Äôs global cultural and professional footprint.Additionally, 16 Padma awards will be conferred posthumously.The Padma Vibhushan honours exceptional and distinguished service, the Padma Bhushan recognises distinguished service of a high order, and the Padma Shri is awarded for distinguished service in any field. The 2026 list includes achievers from a wide range of disciplines, such as art, social work, public affairs, medicine, science and engineering, literature and education, sports, trade and industry, and the civil services.
Article Summary: Cnn.com will feature ireporter photos in a weekly travel snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of the u.s. for next week. Visit cnn.com/travel next friday for a new gallery of snapshots from around the world.

Article Title: Padma Awards 2026: Kailash Chand, Brij Lal Bhatt, Dr Shyam Sundar and more named as awardees - check full list
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Ahead of Republic Day , a provisional list of this year‚Äôs Padma Awards has been released, as per sources. Those believed to be on the list are said to represent individuals with long-standing contributions across diverse fields.The awardees are from varied regions, including remote and underserved areas, and many have worked at the grassroots level for decades. Their contributions span healthcare, education, livelihood generation, sanitation, environmental sustainability, and the preservation of traditional arts and heritage. Several are also said to belong to marginalised communities.The awards are expected to continue the focus on the 'unsung heroes', recognising individuals whose sustained, often low-profile efforts have had a meaningful social impact. The official list is likely to be announced as part of the customary Republic Day honours.Here's the full list of 'unsung heroes' that have been awarded:1. Anke Gowda2. Armida Fernandez3. Bhagwandas Raikwar4. Bhiklya Ladakya Dhinda5. Brij Lal Bhat6. Budhri Tati7. Charan Hembram8. Chiranji Lal Yadav9. Dharmiklal Chunilal Pandya10. Gafruddin Mewati Jogi11. Hally War12. Inderjit Singh Sidhu13. K Pajanivel14. Kailash Chandra Pant15. Khem Raj Sundriyal16. Kollakkayil Devaki Amma G17. Kumarasamy Thangaraj18. Mahendra Kumar Mishra19. Mir Hajibhai Kasambhai20. Mohan Nagar21. Naresh Chandra Dev Varma22. Nilesh Vinodchandra Mandlewala23. Nuruddin Ahmed24. Othuvar Thiruthani Swaminathan25. Padma Gurmet26. Pokhila Lekthepi27. Punniamurthy Natesan28. R Krishnan29. Raghupat Singh30. Raghuveer Tukaram Khedkar31. Rajastapathi Kaliappa Goundar32. Rama Reddy Mamidi33. Ramchandra Godbole and Sunita Godbole34. S G Susheelamma35. Sangyusang S Pongener36. Shafi Shauq37. Shrirang Devaba Lad38. Shyam Sundar39. Simanchal Patro40. Suresh Hanagavadi41. Taga Ram Bheel42. Techi Gubin43. Thiruvaarur Bakthavathsalam44. Vishwa Bandhu45. Yumnam Jatra Singh
Article Summary: The awardees are from varied regions, including remote and underserved areas. Many have worked at the grassroots level for decades. The official list is likely to be announced as part of the customary republic day honours. The awards are expected to continue the focus on the 'unsung heroes'

Article Title: Cooper Kupp‚Äôs wife Anna sparks debate after wearing Seahawks coat against Rams in NFC Championship showdown
Article Text:
Cooper Kupp and wife Anna Marie (Instagram)

Cooper Kupp finds strength in family as Seahawks journey turns personal



Cooper Kupp stood at the center of one of the most emotional Sundays of the NFL season, carrying history, heartbreak, and hope into a championship stage. Once celebrated as the face of a Super Bowl comeback in Los Angeles, the veteran wide receiver now wears different colors with the same quiet fire. The moment felt heavy and personal, shaped not just by football, but by family, loyalty, and a career that refuses to slow down.At 32, Kupp understands how quickly the league moves on. The Rams chose not to meet his expectations in free agency, closing a chapter that included a Super Bowl MVP and countless clutch catches. Seattle did not hesitate. A three year, $45 million deal with $17.5 million guaranteed gave him a fresh start, and it placed him face to face with the past sooner than anyone expected.The NFC Championship Game against Los Angeles was more than a playoff matchup. It was a collision of memories. Kupp embraced former teammates Matthew Stafford and Puka Nacua before kickoff, sharing smiles that hinted at mutual respect and unfinished emotions. Then he turned toward the stands, where his true support system waited.Anna Marie Kupp and their three sons made their presence impossible to miss. Cooper Jameson, born in 2018, Cypress Stellar, born in 2021, and Solas Reign, born in 2023, proudly wore Seahawks gear and Kupp jerseys.Anna added a custom ‚Äú10‚Äù coat, blending style with meaning. The image spoke louder than words. This was a family fully committed to the next chapter.Their bond has deep roots. Cooper and Anna met as teenagers at a high school track meet in Washington, when she handed him a medal after a race. He has often described that moment as love at first sight. They married in 2015, long before the bright lights of Super Bowls and free agency drama.In a June 2022 conversation with PEOPLE, Kupp described his wife as the "absolute warrior" of their family. That strength has carried them through relocations, injuries, and now a rivalry that feels personal. Anna once shared a heartfelt note about moving back to the Pacific Northwest, a return that felt both emotional and empowering.For Cooper Kupp, revenge is not loud. It lives in preparation, precision, and purpose. Surrounded by family and fueled by unfinished business, he stepped onto the field not just to beat his former team, but to honor the journey that brought him there.
Article Summary: Cooper kupp signed a three year, $45 million deal with the seattle seahawks. The rams chose not to meet his expectations in free agency. The nfc championship game was more than a playoff matchup. It was a collision of memories.

Article Title: Will Drake Maye play against the Denver Broncos today? Latest injury update on the New England Patriots' QB
Article Text:
Drake Maye is healthy and set to start for the New England Patriots in the AFC Championship Game against the Denver Broncos. He has a chance to achieve something the franchise has never done by winning a playoff game in Denver. With the Patriots unbeaten on the road this season, Maye leads a confident team into a hostile, high-altitude environment.

Drake Maye injury update and what it means for New England

History hangs heavy in Denver, especially for the New England Patriots. The thin air, the noise, and the playoff scars of the past all return this weekend as the AFC Championship sets the stage for something the franchise has never pulled off. This is not about nostalgia or legacy alone. It is about opportunity, pressure, and a quarterback stepping into a moment that once swallowed even the greatest names.The Patriots arrive with momentum and belief. Road games have become their comfort zone this season, not a burden. The stakes could not be higher, and the quarterback at the center of it all understands exactly what is in front of him. Denver offers no sympathy, only resistance, history, and a direct path to the Super Bowl.Drake Maye is healthy and will start for the New England Patriots against the Denver Broncos in Sunday‚Äôs AFC Championship Game. No injury designation followed Maye into the weekend, clearing the way for him to lead an offense chasing history in one of the league‚Äôs toughest playoff environments.Maye has a rare chance to do something not even Tom Brady managed in a Patriots uniform. New England is winless in four playoff games played in Denver, with Brady going 0 for 3.That context is not lost on the rookie quarterback.‚ÄúJust the AFC championship, the chance to go to the Super Bowl. That‚Äôd be huge,‚Äù Maye said. ‚ÄúAnother road environment that‚Äôs had success in the past. ‚Ä¶ I know it would be a big-time win.‚ÄùThe Patriots earned this opportunity by beating Houston in the divisional round and finishing the regular season unbeaten on the road. That mentality has been reinforced all year under head coach Mike Vrabel.‚ÄúCoach (Vrabel) has always been saying, ‚ÄòRoad warriors,‚Äô‚Äù Maye said. ‚ÄúSo, we‚Äôre trying to find that one more time and finish out strong what we‚Äôve done this year.‚ÄùDenver‚Äôs home record and altitude remain real obstacles, but New England enters healthy at quarterback and confident in its approach. For Maye, availability is not the question. Execution is.
Article Summary: Drake maye is healthy and set to start for the new england patriots in the afc championship game against the denver broncos. New england is winless in four playoff games played in denver, with tom brady going 0 for 3. The patriots earned this opportunity by beating houston in the divisional round and finishing the regular season unbeaten on the road.

Cleveland Cavaliers vs Orlando Magic Key Matchups (January 24, 2026)

Thevisit theon January 24, 2026, at the Kia Center in a matchup that matters for Eastern Conference standings. Cleveland comes in at 26-20, while Orlando is 23-20, with both teams trying to stay in the playoff mix.Injuries are shaping this game on both sides. Rotations are thinner than usual, and several key players are unavailable. That puts more pressure on the starters and shifts the focus toward interior scoring, rebounding, and half-court execution.Cleveland is on the second night of a back-to-back and will be without several perimeter players. Darius Garland is out with a right great toe strain. Sam Merrill is sidelined with a right hand sprain. Max Strus continues to recover from left foot surgery (Jones fracture). Chris Livingston and Luke Travers are unavailable due to G-League two-way assignments.Orlando could get Jalen Suggs back, with his status listed as probable after missing three weeks with a right knee MCL contusion. Franz Wagner remains out with left ankle soreness. Colin Castleton is unavailable on a G-League assignment. With these absences, both teams are expected to lean heavily on their frontcourt players.Both teams are likely to play through the paint more than usual given the depleted backcourts.Cleveland leads the all-time regular-season series 67-62 across 129 games, though Orlando has traditionally performed well at home against them. This season, the Cavaliers hold a 2-1 edge, outscoring the Magic by an average margin of 10 points per game. Cleveland has averaged 120.0 points in those matchups, while Orlando has scored 110.0. Rebounding has been a key factor so far. The teams will meet again on January 26, March 11, and March 24.Cleveland holds a slight edge on offense, while Orlando has been more consistent defensively, even with recent lineup changes.Donovan Mitchell remains the engine of Cleveland‚Äôs offense, averaging a career-high 28.9 points per game and posting a strong on-court net rating. His matchup with Jalen Suggs, if Suggs plays, will be central, especially given Suggs‚Äô impact on defense.In the frontcourt, Evan Mobley and Jarrett Allen carry much of Cleveland‚Äôs interior workload, while Paolo Banchero and Wendell Carter Jr. anchor Orlando‚Äôs attack. Orlando averages 54.0 points in the paint per game, which could test Cleveland‚Äôs interior defense. Mobley is coming off a strong performance with 29 points and 13 rebounds.Orlando has played well at home, while Cleveland enters on a two-game win streak. With both teams short-handed, this game is likely to come down to execution, rebounding, and who controls the paint late.
Article Summary: The cleveland cavaliers host the orlando magic on january 24, 2026. Cleveland leads the all-time regular-season series 67-62 across 129 games. This season, the cavaliers hold a 2-1 edge, outscoring the magic by an average margin of 10 points per game. Orlando averages 54.0 points in the paint per game, which could test cleveland‚Äôs interior defense.

Article Title: ‚ÄúThe writing just dries up‚Äù: Travis Kelce romance fuels debate as Taylor Swift fears her lyrical storytelling is fading
Article Text:
Taylor Swift recently admitted she once feared happiness could weaken her songwriting as her romance with Travis Kelce deepened. She worried that joy might replace the emotional tension that fueled her lyrics. However, her latest album proved otherwise, showing she can create vibrant, story-driven music even during one of the happiest chapters of her life.

Travis Kelce relationship changed how Taylor Swift views pain, joy, and creativity

The End of an Era: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce Love Story Secrets REVEALED!

Being an artist of emotional honesty, Taylor Swift has developed her career on the belief that doubt was lingering silently in the creative process unimpeded by the polished albums and sold-out tours. She struggled with having a troubling question that most artists dread but hardly confess to as her personal life became more placid and satisfied. But when pain is no longer the guide of creativity what becomes of it?This question became even more burning with the further development of her relations with Travis Kelce . The happiness that she felt offstage thus heightened some anxiety as to the implications of its effect on her songwriting. To an artist so much praised to transform heartache into brilliance, happiness was strange grounds even dangerous.Taylor Swift openly addressed that concern while reflecting on her mindset before completing "The Life of a Showgirl". Speaking candidly, she admitted, ‚ÄúI used to have this dark fear that if I ever were truly happy and free, being myself and nurtured by a relationship, what happens if the writing just dries up?‚Äù She continued, ‚ÄúWhat if writing is directly tied to my torment and pain?‚ÄùThose doubts did not survive the creative process. The album emerged during a whirlwind chapter that included her Eras Tour and a stable personal life. Instead of dulling her edge, that happiness sharpened it.‚ÄúIt turns out, that‚Äôs not the case at all, and we just were catching lightning in a bottle with this record,‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúBut it‚Äôs nice because you‚Äôre coming from a place of happiness and love, you can go back to those places. You can look forward to other things.‚ÄùOn Travis Kelce‚Äôs podcast, she described the emotional fuel behind the project. ‚ÄúThis album is about what was going on behind the scenes in my inner life during this tour, which was so exuberant and electric and vibrant,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIt just comes from, like, the most infectiously joyful, wild, dramatic place I was in in my life.‚ÄùKelce noticed the shift immediately. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been fortunate enough to hear every single song on here, so I know they‚Äôre all 12 bangers,‚Äù he said, adding, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a lot more upbeat ‚Ä¶ like fun, pop excitement.‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs a complete 180 from a lot of the songs on Tortured Poets.‚ÄùSwift‚Äôs story challenges a tired myth. Creativity does not require suffering. Sometimes, it grows louder when life finally feels steady.
Article Summary: Taylor swift once feared happiness could weaken her songwriting as her romance with travis kelce deepened. She worried that joy might replace the emotional tension that fueled her lyrics. Her latest album proved otherwise, showing she can create vibrant, story-driven music even during one of the happiest chapters of her life.

Article Title: 'BCB will consider if ... ': Bangladesh give Sheikh Hasina-linked cricketer Shakib Al Hasan ultimate selection conditions
Article Text:
Shakib Al Hasan

Bangladesh cricket in turmoil: What it means for the T20 World Cup?

Bangladesh cricket officials have said former captain Shakib Al Hasan could be considered for a return to the national team, reopening the possibility less than a year after his retirement from international cricket.Shakib, who was also a lawmaker from the former ruling party that was removed in a 2024 uprising, had become a focus of public anger because of his association with ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina. He was among several people named in murder cases linked to a police crackdown on protesters. In 2024, Shakib announced his retirement but said last month that he was open to reversing that decision.Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) senior official Amzad Hossain said the board had taken a collective view on the matter.‚ÄúThe board has taken a unanimous decision that if Shakib Al Hasan's availability, fitness and accessibility allow it -- and if he can be present at the venue where matches are played -- then the board and the selection panel will consider him for the national team,‚Äù Hossain told reporters late Saturday.He said the BCB would also allow Shakib to play in overseas leagues if he wished.‚ÄúIf he wants to participate in other global tournaments, the board will provide him NOC as required,‚Äù Amzad added.Shakib had earlier apologised for staying silent during the student-led uprising, while also defending his decision to be part of the government that was later removed.The development comes at a time when Bangladesh cricket is dealing with the fallout of being excluded from next month‚Äôs T20 World Cup. On Saturday, the International Cricket Council (ICC) replaced Bangladesh with Scotland.The BCB had declined to send the team to India and asked for their matches to be moved to co-host Sri Lanka. The issue escalated earlier this month after the Indian cricket board asked IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders to release Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman.The ICC said there was no credible security threat to Bangladesh in India, but the BCB said the final call rested with the government.‚ÄúThis is a government decision taken on security grounds,‚Äù Amzad said. ‚ÄúBecause of that, there was nothing more we could do.‚ÄùShakib was playing in a domestic T20 tournament in Canada when Hasina‚Äôs government fell and has not returned to Bangladesh since. He has represented Bangladesh in 71 Tests, 247 one-day internationals and 129 T20 internationals, taking a total of 712 wickets across formats.
Article Summary: Bangladesh cricket officials say former captain shakib al hasan could be considered for a return to the national team. Shakib retired from international cricket in 2024 but said last month he was open to reversing that decision. The development comes at a time when bangladesh cricket is dealing with the fallout of being excluded from next month‚Äôs t20 world cup.

Article Title: NBA injury report: Is Jakob Poeltl out of NBA season? Toronto Raptors star's lingering back problem keeps team waiting for answers
Article Text:
Jakob Poeltl's return is uncertain (Image via Getty Images)

Toronto Raptors still in the dark as Jakob Poeltl‚Äôs back issue shows no clear return timeline

Jakob Poeltl‚Äôs absence leaves a growing hole in Raptors‚Äô frontcourt despite strong playoff push

Jakob Poeltl, the starting center for the Toronto Raptors, has not yet received a return date. According to Marc Stein, Poeltl is presently taking care of his "ongoing back issues," according to the Raptors. Due to a lower back issue, the 30-year-old Austrian hasn't played since December, missing 17 games.Jakob last appeared in an official NBA game on December 21, 2025, during a 96‚Äì81 away loss in Brooklyn. He left the game early after playing just seven minutes. Poeltl appeared to be in line for a comeback during the team's five-game road trip, which ends today in Oklahoma City.The Toronto Raptors have provided an injury update on Jakob Poeltl, who has been sidelined for more than a month due to a back problem. Poeltl was back in Toronto for pain relief treatment. Poeltl has returned to Toronto and undergone specialized pain management, according to the Raptors.We'll update his status once he resumes practicing. Additionally, the official announcement of the team read:‚ÄúThe Toronto Raptors announced Sunday that center Jakob Poeltl, who has been managing ongoing back issues, returned to Toronto and has received targeted pain relief treatment. A return timeline has not yet been established, and his status will be updated when he returns to practice‚Ä¶‚ÄùHowever, the problem started much earlier. According to Michael Grange, the center has been dealing with a back issue that started back in training camp.This makes sense because even before the most recent game in Brooklyn, Poeltl was still missing time occasionally and was typically rested on one leg of back-to-backs.Meanwhile, the announcement further said:‚ÄúPoeltl is averaging 9.7 points, 7.7 rebounds, 2.1 assists and 25.3 minutes in 21 games (all starts) this season. He last played Dec. 21 at Brooklyn before exiting the game midway through the first quarter‚Ä¶‚ÄùOn Sunday night, Toronto will travel to Oklahoma City to play the NBA's top team, the Thunder.The big man has had difficulty maintaining his health, and his absence creates a significant void in Toronto's frontcourt lineup. According to the Raptors, Poeltl has returned to Toronto and undergone specialized pain management. We'll update his status once he resumes practicing.The team and Yak have no choice but to return to Toronto in an attempt to resolve this problem after this setback. The Raptors, who have a 28‚Äì19 record and are in fourth place in the Eastern Conference, are still competitive despite Poeltl's injury.Due to a tiebreaker, the Raptors, who have won three straight games, are now fourth in the Eastern Conference at 28-19, behind New York. Toronto is six games behind Detroit and one game behind Boston, which is in second place. In 21 games this season, Poeltl has averaged 9.7 points and 7.7 rebounds.
Article Summary: Toronto raptors still in the dark as jakob poeltl‚Äôs back issue shows no clear return timeline despite strong playoff push. The 30-year-old austrian hasn't played since december, missing 17 games. According to michael grange, the center has been dealing with a back issue that started back in training camp.

Article Title: Heartwarming NBA birthday moment: Gabrielle Union‚Äôs loving tribute makes Dwyane Wade‚Äôs big day even more special
Article Text:
Gabrielle Union and Dwyane Wade are an adorable couple (Image via Getty Images)

Gabrielle Union‚Äôs emotional toast and intimate dinner make Dwyane Wade‚Äôs birthday celebration truly special

Last week, Kaavia James stole the spotlight with an adorable birthday tribute for dad Dwyane Wade

In honor of the iconic Dwyane Wade's 44th birthday, South Beach and the entire basketball community take a moment on January 17. His wife and daughter, among others, sent him well wishes, as was to be anticipated. On her husband's 43rd birthday, Gabrielle Union gave him a loving tribute.Union shared a heartfelt four-word remark expressing her love and respect for the NBA star along with a wonderful old photo. Recently, Union was seen celebrating her husband‚Äôs birthday in a restaurant, with their friends and family members.On Friday, NBA legend Dwyane Wade and his wife, Gabrielle Union, celebrated Wade's 43rd birthday. Union expressed her admiration for the NBA Hall of Famer in a poignant post on her Instagram story, where she was seen celebrating Wade's birthday.Union raised her glass in honor of the Miami Heat legend and spoke before he could cut the cake. She said:‚ÄúAnd the guy you call when you dislocate me. I love you. I love you so much and everyone in this room loves you‚Ä¶ And I hope this day is as awesome as you are. So if you want to say a few words, bring it in a few people..‚ÄùThe video was initially shared by DJ Trauma on their Instagram Stories. The actress then shared the same on her Instagram. This wasn‚Äôt the first wish from Union. Last week, on Wade‚Äôs birthday, Union posted the following quotation from the legend during his retirement:"I see myself retiring from the NBA to spend time with my wife and kids.Also retiring as one of the greatest to play the game.‚ÄùThere were pictures of him and his victories in the image as well. Union included a lovely note with the picture:"It's my baby's birthday!!!! @dwyanewade.‚ÄùAdditionally, during the same time, the couple went to Yamashiro Miami, a Japanese restaurant, to celebrate the birthday of the Miami legend and have dinner together. The eatery posted a photo of the couple to Instagram with the following caption:‚ÄúA celebration above the city. Honored to welcome Dwyane Wade and his beautiful wife Gabrielle Union to Yamashiro Miami for a special birthday evening. Happy Birthday to a true legend‚Ä¶ Thank you for choosing us to be part of the moment‚Ä¶‚ÄùFollowing the restaurant's social media post, the actress posted the image to her Instagram Stories with the following caption:‚ÄúIncredible dinner last night in Miami! Thank you @mattthealchemist for making the connect!‚ÄùKaavia James, the couple's gorgeous daughter, also wrote a sweet greeting on the same date. On January 18, the 6-year-old shared a carousel on Instagram. The first photo featured the 44-year-old NBA player dancing with his daughter.The caption of the post read:‚ÄúPromise to always follow your lead one step at a time! So lucky to call you daddy! Happy birthday weekend daddy!‚ÄùIt included multiple images and videos of the couple enjoying themselves and giving each other hugs. Wade appears in one of the pictures sporting a bright pink knit beanie and a white top. He puckered his lips slightly and had a carefree, happy expression.Kavya is carefully holding a lip gloss applicator and applying it to his lips while gazing at him intensely. She is wearing a white hoodie with a cartoon princess on it. He has two other daughters, Zaya and Zaire, in addition to Kaavia. He also has a 9-year-old son named Xavier Zechariah. Wade also looks for his 21-year-old nephew, Dahveon Morris.
Article Summary: On friday, nba legend dwyane wade and his wife, gabrielle union, celebrated wade's 43rd birthday. Union expressed her admiration for the nba hall of famer in a poignant post on her instagram story. Kaavia james, the couple's 6-year-old daughter, also wrote a sweet greeting on the same date.

Article Title: Reggie Miller says Stephen Curry should make the call to Giannis as Father Time is knocking
Article Text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo, Stephen Curry and Reggie Miller (Images via Getty)

The Warriors‚Äô franchise in desperation after Jimmy Butler‚Äôs ACL

The Milwaukee Bucks ‚Äô meltdown

Reggie Miller just tossed a grenade into the NBA rumor mill, and it‚Äôs landing right in the middle of Chase Center. Speaking on The Dan Patrick Show, the Hall of Famer didn‚Äôt mince words: he believes it is time for Stephen Curry to pick up the phone and recruit Giannis Antetokounmpo to the Golden State Warriors. With the Bucks currently languishing in 11th place in the East and the Warriors reeling from Jimmy Butler‚Äôs season-ending ACL injury, Miller argues that the Greek Freak might be the only answer to save Steph‚Äôs remaining prime.The logic is simple but devastating, as Miller suggests Curry needs to remind Giannis that while his Milwaukee legacy is secure, Father Time is officially knocking on the door in San Francisco. A Curry-Giannis pairing wouldn't just be a trade, it would be a shift in the league's tectonic plates, combining the greatest gravity in perimeter history with the most dominant interior force of this generation.When asked about the trade window closing, Miller said, ‚ÄúHalfway closed and especially now with the injury to Butler, almost closed unless something drastically happens.‚ÄùThe Warriors find themselves at a brutal crossroads. Before Butler went down, the vision was clear: a gritty, veteran-heavy squad capable of one last deep run. Now, sitting near the play-in line, the Dubs are a team with a superstar and a vacuum of secondary scoring. Mike Dunleavy Jr. has the assets, Jonathan Kuminga, Moses Moody, and a chest of future first-round picks, but the front office has been hesitant to empty the clip‚ÄúIf I'm Stephen Curry, maybe I open up my Rolodex. Wow. And maybe it's time that I call someone in the Midwest by the name of Giannis Antetokounmpo, and say, look, what you've done in Milwaukee has been fabulous.It's been great. You brought them a championship, their first in 50 years, but the time is now. You're You're getting older. I'm certainly knocking on Father Time's door," said Miller on the Warriors' need for another talent like Giannis, along with Curry and Green to make them an indispensable force for the championship run.For Giannis Antetokounmpo, the grass in the Bay might actually be greener, as despite his public loyalty, the Bucks are currently an 18-26 mess, struggling to find a rhythm under Doc Rivers. The 100-102 loss against Nuggets brought much bigger chaos for Bucks as Giannis left the match after a no-contact injury.Insiders suggest that while Milwaukee isn't answering the phone yet, the league feels an impending breakup between the two. If the Warriors can pull off the impossible, they wouldn't just be replacing Butler‚Äôs production, they‚Äôd be creating a nightmare for the rest of the league. A Giannis rim run with Steph and Buddy Hield spacing the floor is quite literally unguardable.
Article Summary: Reggie miller believes it is time for stephen curry to recruit giannis antetokounmpo to the golden state warriors. Miller argues that the greek freak might be the only answer to save steph‚Äôs remaining prime. A curry-giannis pairing would be a shift in the league's tectonic plates, combining the greatest gravity in perimeter history with the most dominant interior force of this generation.

Article Title: SA20: What makes Sunrisers Eastern Cape a sporting dynasty - 'A well-balanced team'
Article Text:
2026 Champions Sunrisers Eastern Cape (SEC) celebrate during the final of the Betway SA20 season 4 between Pretoria Capitals (PC) and The Sunrisers Eastern Cape (SEC) held at the Newlands Cricket Stadium in Cape Town, South Africa on the 25th January 2026. (Photo by Shaun Roy / Sportzpics for SA20)

TimesofIndia.com in Cape Town:

‚ÄòIt‚Äôs a tight schedule‚Äô: Chris Morris on injuries in South Africa‚Äôs T20 World Cup squad

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

SEC celebrates with the trophy during the final of the Betway SA20 season 4 between Pretoria Capitals (PC) and The Sunrisers Eastern Cape (SEC) held at the Newlands Cricket Stadium in Cape Town, South Africa on the 25th January 2026. (Photo by Carl Fourie / Sportzpics for SA20)

Sunrisers Eastern Cape coach Adrian Birrell and Sunrisers Eastern Cape captain Tristan Stubbs during the post match press conference after the final of the Betway SA20 season 4 between Pretoria Capitals (PC) and The Sunrisers Eastern Cape (SEC) held at the Newlands Cricket Stadium in Cape Town, South Africa on the 25th January 2026. (Photo by Shaun Roy / Sportzpics for SA20)

Matthew Breetzke of Sunrisers Eastern Cape and Sunrisers Eastern Cape captain Tristan Stubbs celebrate as Sunrisers Eastern Cape (SEC) beat Pretoria Capitals (PC) by 6 wickets to become SA20 Champions during the final of the Betway SA20 season 4 between Pretoria Capitals (PC) and The Sunrisers Eastern Cape (SEC) held at the Newlands Cricket Stadium in Cape Town, South Africa on the 25th January 2026. (Photo by Shaun Roy / Sportzpics for SA20)

Poll Do you believe the Sunrisers Eastern Cape can maintain their winning streak next season? Yes, they have a strong team. No, other teams will catch up.

On December 30, 2025, former South Africa seamer Dale Steyn made a bold declaration on social media. "SEC [Sunrisers Eastern Cape] are def [definitely] one of my finalists. Possibly even champions again. But let's come back to this in two weeks. " It wasn't an outlandish bet to make. They had been to the final three times in three seasons, winning two.As they booked a place in the final once again, for the fourth straight time, Steyn wrote, "Surprise. Surprise. SEC in the FINAL, again."A little over three weeks after Steyn's original prediction, SEC were on the field against the Pretoria Capitals at Newlands in Cape Town. The task at hand for the Tristan Stubbs-led side was to chase down 159 runs.The World Cup-bound Stubbs, who had a mediocre campaign, had Matthew Breetzke for company. The job was difficult: 56 runs needed in 24 balls. Lizaad Williams and Lungi Ngidi, who had gone for a paltry six an over, each had an over.Steyn was worried and the confidence in the SEC was shaky. "SEC may have left this a little late. New champions on route," he posted.What transpired, however, was a remarkable turnaround. Stubbs, who was included in the T20 World Cup squad only because of injuries in the camp, played a captain's knock, turning a 35 off 28 balls into an unbeaten 62 runs off 41 balls. Breetzke was equally impressive, pulling off a 49-ball, 68-run knock.Even if Dewald Brevis' 101-run knock in the first innings earned him the Player of the Match award, Stubbs-Breetzke's 114-run partnership for the fifth wicket took SEC to their fourth title.Let that register fully. Four years, four finals and three titles. This is stuff of sporting dynasties. Like Perth Scorchers who won their sixth Big Bash League (BBL) title in 15 seasons on Sunday. In American sports, think the Boston Celtics, Chicago Bulls, the New York Yankees and the New England Patriots. You get the idea.What's the secret? "I think we've got a very well-balanced team. No disrespect to others but I think we've probably got the most balanced of teams. We've got good spin, we've got good pace and high-quality batters and an experienced opening pair," said coach Adrian Birrell in an unprecedented press conference that assembled the entire playing XI."I think we probably were the side that played the least number of players. Didn't chop and change, which is very hard on the bench, but we've got a fantastic bench that could have played and they were really high-quality players, which gave me as coach a lot of confidence. But I think we've got a really good squad here and I think that showed this year that we were probably the most consistent team," continued the former South Africa national team assistant coach.The numbers back that claim. SEC had topped the table this season. They also had the most bonus points in the league stage. Zooming out across the four seasons, SEC has the most wins, holds the best win-loss ratio and scored the most runs.From Aiden Markram earlier to Tristan Stubbs now, the leadership duties have been handled perfectly. And Stubbs has found a perfect ally in Quinton de Kock to lean on for support when required. But the decision to pass the captaincy armband to 'Stubbo', who has only had one strong season for the franchise (2024), speaks highly of their preference for building a team rather than highlighting individuals."I've really enjoyed this month," said Stubbs in reflection of the season. "I've had a great group to work with. We've planned really well for games. The bowlers are really experienced, so it's been easy. Me and Quinny [Quinton de Kock] have had this great thing going where we channelled a lot of the bowling changes. It's been a whole team effort. The senior players have been awesome. It's awesome to finish like this."As the beers were passed around in the room to culminate another trophy-laden season, a look back at the start cannot be ignored.At the auction, the Sunrisers Eastern Cape signed Quinton de Kock and Anrich Nortje . De Kock finished as the leading run-scorer in the fourth season of the SA20 while Nortje was second on the wicket-taker's list. Wildcard pick Marco Jansen's 13 wickets made him the SA20's second-most successful bowler.Steyn sums things up nicely: "SEC lead [sic] by Stubbs and the great coach Adi Birrell do it again üèÜ. Stubbs you champion! SA20 you‚Äôre incredible! SA fans are special! What a tournament! Can‚Äôt wait for season 5!"
Article Summary: Sunrisers eastern cape (sec) beat pretoria capitals (pc) by 6 wickets to become sa20 champions during the final of the betway sa20 season 4. The tristan stubbs-led side had been to the final three times in three seasons, winning two. Former south africa seamer dale steyn made a bold declaration on social media that sec were one of his finalists.

Article Title: ‚ÄòYou never know‚Äô: Abhishek Sharma flirts with Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs iconic T20I record after blazing knock
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shivam Dube press conference: On Ishan and Surya‚Äôs knock & his role with the ball

Poll Will Abhishek Sharma break Yuvraj Singh's record of 12-ball half-century? Yes, it's possible! No, it‚Äôs too tough!

NEW DELHI: Explosive India opener Abhishek Sharma lit up the Barsapara Cricket Stadium on Sunday with a breathtaking display of power-hitting, smashing the second-fastest T20I half-century by an Indian during the third T20I against New Zealand as India cruised to a dominant eight-wicket win.Abhishek reached his fifty in just 14 balls, eclipsing Hardik Pandya‚Äôs 16-ball effort to move into elite company. Only Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs legendary 12-ball blitz against England in the 2007 T20 World Cup stands ahead of him.Chasing a modest 154, India stormed to 94/2 inside the powerplay, with Abhishek setting the tone in emphatic fashion. The 25-year-old remained unbeaten on a stunning 68 off just 20 deliveries, striking five fours and four sixes as the hosts wrapped up the chase with ease.‚ÄúThat‚Äôs what my team wants from me and I just want to execute all the time,‚Äù Abhishek said after the match. ‚ÄúObviously, it‚Äôs not easy to do it every time, but I think it‚Äôs all about mental as well and the atmosphere you get around your dressing room.‚ÄùWhen asked about the possibility of breaking Yuvraj‚Äôs iconic record, Abhishek was respectful yet quietly optimistic. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs more than impossible for anyone, but still, you never know,‚Äù he said.‚ÄúAny batsman could do it because all the batters have been batting really well in this series and going forward, it‚Äôs going to be fun.‚ÄùAbhishek also explained his fearless approach, including hitting another six off the first ball of the innings. ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt say I want to go from the first ball. It‚Äôs just the instinct I get. I think about what the bowler could bowl to me and I just want to play on that ball,‚Äù he explained.Detailing his innovative footwork, he added, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs all about the field placement. If I get room for myself, then I have the whole off-side. I just want to play with the field.‚ÄùYuvraj Singh, meanwhile, responded with trademark wit. ‚ÄúStill can‚Äôt get a 50 off 12 balls, can you?‚Äù the World Cup hero posted on social media. ‚ÄúWell played ‚Äî keep going strong!‚Äù
Article Summary: India beat new zealand by eight wickets in the third t20i in delhi. Abhishek sharma hit 68 off just 20 deliveries, including five fours and four sixes. Only yuvraj singh‚Äôs legendary 12-ball blitz against england in the 2007 t20 world cup stands ahead of him.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI stand with the people‚Äù: Karl-Anthony Towns extends heartfelt support as he mourns victims of ICE fatal shooting in Minnesota
Article Text:
Karl-Anthony Towns. Image via: Rocky Widner/ GettyImages

Karl-Anthony Towns mourns the ICE fatal shooting in Minnesota



NBA and WNBA stars react to devastating shooting in Minnesota



Minnesota shooting sparks reactions accross sports



Minnesota is shaken after a fatal shooting involving U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents claimed the lives of Alex Pretti and Ren√©e Good (per Yahoo Sports). As the impact spread beyond the Twin Cities, voices from across the sports world stepped forward to address the tragedy. Knicks star Karl-Anthony Towns shared his honest thoughts and prayers for the victims.The tragedy reached the NBA calendar as well. During the game between the Golden State Warriors and Minnesota Timberwolves, there was a moment of silence held to honor Pretti as he was shown on the Jumbotron.Karl-Anthony Towns, who spent nine seasons with the Timberwolves, addressed the shooting directly in a public statement on X. His message focused on loss, responsibility, and unity.‚ÄúWhat is happening in the Twin Cities and the Great North Star State is heartbreaking to witness. These events have cost lives and shaken families ‚Äî and we must call for accountability, transparency, and protections for all people. This moment demands that we reflect honestly on what our values truly are. My thoughts, prayers, and deepest condolences are with the families of Ren√©e Good and Alex Pretti,‚Äù Towns wrote on X.He added, ‚ÄúI stand with the people of Minnesota.‚ÄùHis statement came ahead of the Timberwolves‚Äô rescheduled game, which included a moment of silence for Pretti. Head coach Chris Finchrevealed that the organization was ‚Äúheartbroken for what we are having to witness and endure and watch.‚ÄùThe response extended well beyond one team. Angel Reese posted, ‚ÄúPraying for our countryü•∫üôèüèΩ.‚Äù Breanna Stewart appeared before an Unrivaled game holding an ‚ÄúAbolish ICE‚Äù sign.Tyrese Haliburton referred to Pretti‚Äôs death as a murder. Warriors coach Steve Kerr said, ‚ÄúIn times like these, you have to lean on values and who you are and who you want to be ‚Äî either as an individual or as a country.‚ÄùThe National Basketball Players Association released a detailed statement supporting players who spoke out and expressing solidarity with Minnesota communities. It defended freedom of speech and offered condolences to the families of Pretti and Good.Organizations across Minnesota also responded. Executives from the Timberwolves, Lynx, Vikings, Wild, United FC, and others issued a joint statement calling for de-escalation and cooperation among leaders at every level of government.Outside of sports, tributes continued. The American Nurses Association president told the BBC the organization was ‚Äúdeeply saddened‚Äù by Pretti‚Äôs death. The University of Minnesota, where he graduated, described the loss as a ‚Äúdeeply painful time for our community‚Äù and urged care, understanding, and healing.
Article Summary: Karl-anthony towns, who spent nine seasons with the timberwolves, addressed the shooting directly in a public statement on x. The national basketball players association released a detailed statement supporting players who spoke out. The american nurses association president told the bbc the organization was ‚Äúdeeply saddened‚Äô by pretti‚Äôs death.

Article Title: Dewald Brevis valiant effort in vain as Tristan Stubbs, Matthew Breetzke script another SA20 title for Sunrisers
Article Text:
Sunrisers Eastern Cape are crowned champions of the SA20 season 4

‚ÄòIt‚Äôs a tight schedule‚Äô: Chris Morris on injuries in South Africa‚Äôs T20 World Cup squad

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Dewald Brevis of Pretoria Capitals celebrates his century during the final of the SA20 season 4 between Pretoria Capitals (PC) and The Sunrisers Eastern Cape (SEC)

Matthew Breetzke Cape and Tristan Stubbs leads Sunrisers Eastern Cape to victory

Poll Who was the standout player in the SA20 Season 4 Final? Dewald Brevis Tristan Stubbs Matthew Breetzke Marco Jansen

Brief Scores

Pretoria Capitals:

Sunrisers Eastern Cape:

Sunrisers Eastern Cape cemented their status as the undisputed kings of the SA20 after clinching a third championship title, edging out Pretoria Capitals in a thrilling Season 4 final.A glorious, sold-out Newlands crowd was treated to entertainment of the highest quality as Sunrisers captain Tristan Stubbs and Matthew Breetzke shared an unbroken 114-run partnership for the fifth wicket to take their team home by six wickets with four balls to spare.The heroics were required after Dewald Brevis had earlier produced one of the finest innings the grand old ground at the foot of Table Mountain has witnessed.Brevis walked in with the Capitals reduced to 8/2 and launched a counter-attack of the highest quality, striking a sublime 101 off 56 balls, including eight fours and seven sixes, to lift his side to 158/7.For much of the Sunrisers‚Äô chase, it appeared the total would be enough to hand the Capitals their maiden SA20 title, until the arrival of Stubbs.The Sunrisers skipper seized the initiative with 21 runs off Gideon Peters‚Äô 18th over to breathe life into the chase.The Newlands crowd was on edge as 12 runs followed off Lungi Ngidi‚Äôs penultimate over before Stubbs delivered the coup de gr√¢ce, smashing two consecutive sixes off Bryce Parsons to send the Sunrisers into seventh heaven.‚ÄúI am really proud and thrilled. It was a hell of a final. For Dewald to play like he did and for us to hold them to 158, and then needing 13 an over for the last four or five overs,‚Äù said Sunrisers coach Adrian Birrell.‚ÄúI‚Äôm very proud. Four finals in a row is a fantastic achievement. I‚Äôm proud of every player and the whole squad. Some players haven‚Äôt featured, but we‚Äôve got a very good bench. To get here again and give ourselves a chance is special.‚ÄùThe four Player of the Match contenders were Matthew Breetzke, Dewald Brevis, Marco Jansen and Tristan Stubbs, with the centurion winning 79.9 percent of the fan vote.‚ÄúYou want to win the trophy, but you want to do it the right way and set an example for the younger generation,‚Äù Birrell added.Stubbs was equally delighted with leading his team to a championship title in his first season as captain.‚ÄúSo stoked, I can‚Äôt explain it. Don‚Äôt know what we did or how we did it. Me and Matty were calm out there, though probably panicking too. We bat so well together and kept looking for an over to get momentum,‚Äù Stubbs said.‚ÄúI came in during the 16th over and we ran with it. Funny things happen under pressure. I‚Äôve really enjoyed this month. We‚Äôve had a great group to work with, planned really well, and have a brilliant Orange Army backing us wherever we go.‚ÄùThe Capitals have now lost two finals to the Sunrisers after their defeat in the inaugural showpiece in 2023, with captain Keshav Maharaj admitting the pain will linger.‚ÄúIt is disappointing, to say the least. Two batters were in and had got set,‚Äù Maharaj said. ‚ÄúYou feel the hurt of coming so close. The starts we get with both bat and ball are things we have to look at.‚ÄúThe boys will hurt for a bit. I‚Äôm not someone who dwells on negatives, but we have to rectify our mistakes if we want to win trophies as a unit.‚Äù158 for 7 in 20 overs (Dewald Brevis 101; Marco Jansen 3/10)162 for 4 in 19.2 overs (Matthew Breetzke 68 not out, Tristan Stubbs 63 not out; Keshav Maharaj 1/23)
Article Summary: Sunrisers eastern cape are crowned champions of the sa20 season 4. Dewald brevis had earlier produced one of the finest innings the grand old ground at the foot of table mountain has witnessed. The sunrisers skipper seized the initiative with 21 runs off gideon peters‚Äô 18th over to breathe life into the chase.

Article Title: 'Pakistan can now achieve its purpose': Asim Munir's foreboding message for world; what does he mean
Article Text: 'Pakistan can now achieve its purpose': Asim Munir's foreboding message for world; what does he mean
Article Summary: 'pakistan can now achieve its purpose': asim munir's foreboding message for world; what does he mean? Munir: 'pakistan can no longer be seen as a nation of terrorists. Pakistan can now be seen to be a country of freedom and democracy'

Article Title: Shattering records and cultivating future stars
Article Text:
Mayura Shanbaug

Ashish Kumar Srivastava - MD and CEO of PNB MetLife

Sameer Bansal - Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife

Chirag Shetty - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Satwiksairaj Rankireddy - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Disclaimer: Content Produced by PNB Metlife

The 7th PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide, earning global recognition and fostering a culture of resilience and determination in aspiring badminton starsIn a spectacular display of badminton prowess and youthful enthusiasm, the 7th edition of the PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship (JBC) etched its name in the annals of sporting history. Celebrating a staggering participation of 8257 young champions from across India, the championship not only broke its own record set in 2022 but also clinched the title of the ‚ÄòMost kids participating in a Badminton Championship in multiple cities‚Äô as recognised by the World Record Certification Agency (WRCA).The grand finale unfolded at the Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium in New Delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton. The event, graced by chief guests Chirag Shetty and Satwik Rankireddy, Asian Games Gold Medalists and JBC 2023 mentors, was a true celebration of the sport‚Äôs rising stars.The 10-city extravaganza, spanning the length and breadth of the country, showcased the unwavering commitment of PNB MetLife in nurturing young talents in the badminton arena. With participants exceeding 8200, it‚Äôs evident that the PNB MetLife JBC has become a beacon for aspiring shuttlers, highlighting the deep-seated passion for badminton among the diverse and talented youth of India.Beyond the glitz and glamour of the record-breaking numbers, the championship holds a special place in the hearts of those at the helm. Ashish Kumar Srivastava, MD and CEO of PNB MetLife, expressed pride in not just surpassing their own world record but also in contributing to India‚Äôs glory on the international badminton stage. The championship, he emphasized, is not merely a competition but a significant milestone in creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem.This edition of the JBC saw a strategic partnership with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, who served as mentors for the young talents. Sameer Bansal, Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife, acknowledged the pivotal role played by these champions in inspiring the next generation of badminton stars. The focus, according to Bansal, is on unleashing the latent potential of young shuttlers and preparing them for global excellence.The Delhi chapter of the championship witnessed some nail-biting action with over 1000 participants competing fiercely across various categories. From Ananya Talyan‚Äôs stellar performance in Girls Singles Under 9 to Divyansh Rawat‚Äôs triumph in Boys Singles Under 17, the young talents left no shuttle unturned in their quest for victory.The results from the Delhi leg not only showcased the raw talent but also highlighted the championship‚Äôs commitment to breaking barriers. The PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship is not just about records; it‚Äôs about fostering a culture of healthy living, determination, and resilience among the future champions of the sport.In the words of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, the championship serves as an invaluable platform.---------------------------------------------------------------As we celebrate the successful culmination of the 7th edition of PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship , we take pride in surpassing our own world record for highest participation and for being recognized by World Record Certification Agency. Beyond the records, JBC represents a significant milestone in our mission to lay the groundwork for India‚Äô s glory and success on the international badminton stage by creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem that nurtures champions at the grassroots levelThis year has been especially remarkable for PNB MetLife JBC as we joined hands with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy as JBC Mentors for the young talents associated with this tournament. They have played a pivotal role in inspiring young shuttlers to dream big and elevate their game and skills. We are eager for the next edition to unfold in our journey of unveiling the latent badminton potential across our nation and preparing them for global excellenceIt‚Äôs inspiring to witness the boundless talent and enthusiasm within our young athletes. My journey as JBC mentor has been incredibly fulfilling, as I got the opportunity to guide these budding champions and witness the journey of these young badminton stars. This championship is more than a competition; it is a platform that nurtures dreams, ignites aspirations, and, I believe, it is laying the foundation for future gold medalists in the makingTournaments like these serve as an invaluable platform for nurturing and harnessing the potential of our country‚Äôs young badminton stars. Witnessing the enthusiasm, passion, and skill displayed by these emerging shuttlers reinforces the belief that our country has an immense reservoir of talent. My association as a JBC mentor has been a source of immense pride, particularly given the role that the championship is playing in creating an incredible platform that is serving as a powerful catalyst, empowering young players and bolstering their confidence to become future champions
Article Summary: The 7th pnb metlife junior badminton championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide. The grand finale unfolded at the indira gandhi indoor stadium in new delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton.

Article Title: Padma Awards 2026: Uday Kotak named among Padma Bhushan recipients
Article Text:
Padma Vibhushan awardees

Padma Bhushan recipients

Padma Shri awardees

NEW DELHI: Centre on Sunday announced the Padma Awards for 2026 on the eve of Republic Day, conferring the Padma Bhushan on veteran banker and industrialist Uday Kotak for his exceptional contribution to the financial sector, a government statement said.The Padma Awards, among India‚Äôs most prestigious civilian honours, are given in three categories‚ÄîPadma Vibhushan, Padma Bhushan and Padma Shri.On Republic Day eve, the government announced 131 Padma awards for 2026, including five Padma Vibhushan, 13 Padma Bhushan and 113 Padma Shri awards. The total includes two cases in which the award for two individuals is counted as one, the statement said.The awardees span a wide range of fields, including public life, arts, cinema, literature, sports, science and social service.Former Kerala chief minister and veteran communist leader V S Achuthanandan and actor Dharmendra have been awarded the Padma Vibhushan, posthumously, for 2026, the government said.Former Supreme Court judge K T Thomas (public affairs), Hindustani classical musician and violinist N Rajam (art), and eminent Malayalam journalist P Narayanan (literature and education) have also been named Padma Vibhushan awardees.Among those awarded the Padma Bhushan are playback singer Alka Yagnik, former Uttarakhand chief minister Bhagat Singh Koshyari, and actor Mammootty, the Home Ministry said.Advertising veteran Piyush Pandey, Jharkhand Mukti Morcha founder Shibu Soren, BJP leader V K Malhotra, and tennis legend Vijay Amritraj have also been conferred the Padma Bhushan.Actor and comedian Satish Shah has been awarded the Padma Shri, posthumously, the ministry said. Cricketer Rohit Sharma, India women‚Äôs cricket captain Harmanpreet Kaur, and hockey player Savita Punia are among those named Padma Shri awardees.Former Jawaharlal Nehru University vice-chancellor M Jagadesh Kumar, former Prasar Bharati CEO Shashi Shekhar Vempati, and actors R Madhavan and Prosenjit Chatterjee have also been awarded the Padma Shri.The list includes 90 women awardees, six persons from the categories of foreigners, NRIs, PIOs and OCIs, and 16 posthumous awards, the statement added.
Article Summary: The padma awards are among india's most prestigious civilian honours. They are given in three categories: padma vibhushan, padma bhushan and padma shri. The list includes 90 women awardees, six persons from the categories of foreigners, nris, pios and ocis.

Article Title: NYT Connections today‚Äôs hints and answers (#958) for 24 January 2026
Article Text:
What is NYT Connections

Tips to master NYT Connections



Group obvious links first: Eliminating clear groups helps narrow down harder connections.

Think laterally: Some links are clever or idiomatic, so consider alternate meanings.

Use process of elimination: If a word doesn‚Äôt fit one category, it may belong to another.

Observe the hints: Hints can guide your grouping without spoiling the solution entirely.





Connections by The New York Times has fast become an addiction for word game lovers around the world. Taking the addictive simplicity of games like Wordle and marrying it with the complexity of both logic and pattern recognition puzzles, Connections challenges gamers to find the subtle links between evidently random words. Day in and day out, 16 words are lined up every day in a 4x4 grid; the task is to group them into four sets based on hidden themes. Today's Connections puzzle, number 958, is from January 24, 2026. Players will find it an ideal balance between challenge and fun, testing knowledge and mental dexterity. Connections has gained a global following for its clever gameplay and ability to engage players in their analytical and lateral thinking skills, making it a daily intellectual exercise.Connections is more than a word association game. The game tests one's ability to recognise connections among words. The connections can range from very obvious classifications to very smart connections. Unlike other word games, one requires observation and strategy in order to win at Connections. The game can easily be accessed via desktop computers and mobile devices, and it's free, all of which contributes to its immense popularity.Players go on to add it to their daily routine and take pleasure in it as well as the satisfaction that comes with completing each puzzle.To help players without revealing the solution, here are some strategies for January 24, 2026:These hints guide players toward recognising patterns, encouraging logical deduction and strategic grouping without removing the challenge entirely.Here are the connection categories available today in the NYT Connections puzzle:Below are the four correct groups for today‚Äôs puzzle:Look for word patterns: Check for common prefixes, suffixes, or categories like colors, objects, or actions.Following these strategies can make your daily Connections
Article Summary: Connections by the new york times has fast become an addiction for word game lovers around the world. Day in and day out, 16 words are lined up every day in a 4x4 grid; the task is to group them into four sets based on hidden themes. The game tests one's ability to recognise connections among words.

Article Title: Mario Kart World update brings new Knockout Tours races for Nintendo Switch 2 players: What is it and how it works
Article Text:
Mario Kart World's new Knockout Tours on Nintendo Switch 2: What is it and how it works





Nintendo has released a free update for Mario Kart World on the Nintendo Switch 2, adding a team racing feature to Knockout Tour mode for both local wireless and online play. The most recent version, 1.5.0, significantly expands the game's multiplayer options by enabling players to race as a team in Knockout Tour. Bug fixes and general enhancements are also included in the update. According to Nintendo's official support page, the update also contains Polish language support and several game-wide issue fixes.Knockout Tour is a racing mode where 24 drivers race through multiple courses around the world without stopping. There are five checkpoints during the race, and drivers who are below a particular position at each checkpoint are eliminated. Until now, the Knockout Tour has only allowed individual players to race against each other. The new update changes this by allowing up to four teams to compete together.Players can join 2 friends on Nintendo Switch via local wireless or online play. The update lets players set up Knockout Tour races as two teams (12 vs. 12), three teams (8 vs. 8 vs. 8), or four teams (6 vs. 6 vs. 6 vs. 6). If there aren't enough players, computer-controlled drivers will fill the empty spots.Twenty-four drivers start the race, and the bottom four are eliminated at each checkpoint until only four remain. As players approach a checkpoint, they can see which drivers have cleared it in the top-right corner of the screen. Team colours show how each team is doing.After the Knockout Tour ends, the winning team is decided by the total points earned by all team members. Points are awarded based on each driver's overall finish.However, the points awarded in Knockout Tour team races are different from those in other modes. Top finishers earn many more points: 50 points for 1st place, 40 points for 2nd, 35 points for 3rd, and 30 points for 4th. Making it to the final four helps the team. Drivers who don't make it past the first checkpoint only get 1 point.If all four drivers from the same team pass through the final checkpoint, that team wins automatically. Working together as a team is essential for winning. GameChat can help players coordinate better when playing online from different locations.If a player gets eliminated, they can still watch the race until the end. They can switch the camera to follow the driver they want to support and choose from a list of comments to share with other spectators.To add friends, players can select their user icon (My Page) on the system's HOME Menu, then select Add Friend. From there, they can send and accept friend requests in a few ways by following the instructions.For Mario Kart World, every system needs the game to play, but players can bring a friend online if they both play on the same system. Some other games support GameShare, which lets friends play together even when only one person has the game.In addition to the new Knockout Tour team races, the update also addresses several technical issues in the game. The update fixes a problem where the game would sometimes end if a player chose Kamek on Choco Mountain. It also resolves an issue where the displayed rating would sometimes be incorrect when joining "Everyone" in "Online Play" while in a room. Moreover, several other issues have been fixed to improve the overall gameplay experience.
Article Summary: Knockout tour is a racing mode where 24 drivers race through multiple courses. There are five checkpoints during the race, and drivers who are below a particular position at each checkpoint are eliminated. Until now, the knockout tour has only allowed individual players to race against each other.

Article Title: ‚ÄòWe are not going to challenge‚Äô: BCB accepts ICC call as Bangladesh bow out of T20 World Cup
Article Text:
Bangladesh cricket team (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bangladesh cricket in turmoil: What it means for the T20 World Cup?

Poll Do you agree with the ICC's decision to replace Bangladesh with Scotland? Yes, it was the right decision. No, Bangladesh should have participated.

NEW DELHI: The Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) has confirmed it will not challenge the International Cricket Council‚Äôs decision to replace Bangladesh with Scotland in the upcoming ICC Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup, ending weeks of uncertainty and controversy surrounding the tournament.BCB media committee chairman Amzad Hossain made the announcement after a board meeting in Dhaka on Saturday, firmly stating that the board has accepted the ICC‚Äôs ruling and will not pursue any form of arbitration or dispute resolution, according to a report on ESPNCricinfo.‚ÄúWe have accepted the decision of the ICC board,‚Äù Amzad said. ‚ÄúSince the ICC has said that we cannot go and play or they cannot shift our games to Sri Lanka, in this case we cannot go and play in India. Our position remains the same. We are not going to any separate arbitration or anything here.‚ÄùBangladesh‚Äôs withdrawal follows the government‚Äôs refusal to clear the national team for travel to India, citing concerns over player security. At an ICC Board meeting last week, Bangladesh were informed that failure to travel would result in replacement, a message the BCB subsequently relayed to the government.‚ÄúAfter the ICC board meeting, there was a cabinet meeting of the Bangladesh government and a decision was made there,‚Äù Amzad said.‚ÄúThe decision clearly stated that our team will not be able to go to India. This decision has been communicated by the government.‚ÄùAccording to Amzad, the ICC then gave the BCB a 24-hour deadline to confirm participation. ‚ÄúWe told them politely that it is not possible for us to go and play according to this fixture,‚Äù he added.Contrary to reports, Amzad clarified that the BCB never approached the ICC‚Äôs dispute resolution committee. With Bangladesh declining to participate, the ICC moved swiftly to replace them with Scotland, the highest-ranked T20I side outside the original qualification list.The ICC, in its internal assessments, maintained that there was no credible security threat to the Bangladesh team in India and stressed the importance of protecting the integrity and schedule of the global event. After Bangladesh failed to confirm participation within the stipulated deadline, the governing body acted in line with its qualification and governance processes.During Saturday‚Äôs meeting, the BCB was also informed that board director Ishtiaque Sadeque had resigned, citing personal reasons, adding another layer of upheaval to a turbulent chapter for Bangladesh cricket.
Article Summary: Bangladesh cricket board will not challenge icc's decision to replace them with scotland. The decision ends weeks of uncertainty and controversy surrounding the tournament. The government refused to clear the national team for travel to india, citing concerns over player security.
